title: 736: BITCOIN SIGNALING MANIA PHASE TARGET PEAK AT $520K PER BTC ON THIS DATE, SAYS CRYPTO STRATEGIST!!
description:
An emerging crypto strategist unveils a huge price target for Bitcoin in the coming months as he believes the crypto asset is mirroring its 2017 bull market.

Based on the crypto analyst’s chart, Bitcoin can skyrocket entering into a mania phase here in Q4 of 2021 with a target range of $450K - $520K per BTC with the next bear market low range between $65k - $75K.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
